synopsis.text: Her name is Sana, a young girl endowed with an extraordinary ability known as 'Alice's Dream,' which allows her to materialize anything she can imagine, even defying the laws of physics. Confined within a research facility as a test subject, Sana yearns for freedom and a chance to explore the outside world. When she finally escapes, she encounters Zouroku, an old florist with a stern demeanor and a strong sense of justice. Despite his initial reluctance to disrupt his mundane life, Zouroku extends a helping hand to Sana, offering her a place to stay. As they navigate through their daily lives together, the unlikely duo faces various challenges, all while forming an unbreakable bond.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
